alert.note: Alert for Jack; Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued October 24 at 8:44AM CDT until October 24 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Montague County in north central Texas... Northeastern Jack County in north central Texas... * Until 915 AM CDT. * At 844 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms capable of producing both tornadoes and extensive straight line wind damage were located 11 miles west of Newport, or 14 miles north of Jacksboro, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * These dangerous storms will be near... Newport around 900 AM CDT. Lake Amon G Carter around 905 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Postoak. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
